p:
The patient with stable resolved pulmonary CM without significant permanent lung injury is not probably at risk for more severe CoV-2 than others of a similar age and comorbidity profile.
7 This is also likely true for persons with stable disseminated disease without evident inflammation whether on or off antifungal therapy. The patient described in this report has improved from his CoV-2 infection despite active chronic coccidioidal disease with pulmonary cavitation.
